title: filesize(): stat failed in current stable45
body:
current stable45,  log in, go into a subfolder, create a new file. it does not appear in the webinterface, because the php warning is given. obviously the slash is missing after files. probably one of the latter commits caused it? backtrace:

```
fri dec 14 20:09:00 2012] [error] [client 127.0.0.1] php warning:  filesize(): stat failed for /var/lib/ownclouddevdata//stable45/filestief hoch/tiefer, am tiefsten/text.txt in /home/blizzz/owncloud/dev/stable45/lib/filestorage/local.php on line 45, referer: http://zara.owncloud.bzoc/stable45/?app=files&dir=/tief%20hoch/tiefer%2c%20am%20tiefsten
```
